Package org.demoiselle.signer.policy.impl.cades.pkcs7.impl

Class CAdESTimeStampSigner

java.lang.Object
org.demoiselle.signer.policy.impl.cades.pkcs7.impl.CAdESTimeStampSigner
All Implemented Interfaces:
PKCS7TimeStampSigner, TimeStampCadesSigner
public class CAdESTimeStampSigner extends Object implements PKCS7TimeStampSigner
Basic implementation of Time Stamp on CADES format.
